entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
